items.title: Automated Service Platform
items.description: Full-featured Telegram-based system with advanced admin panel, callback architecture, ticket and user management. Integrated middleware layers (rate limiting, blocks, maintenance window), real-time notifications via Celery, Redis caching, Prometheus + Grafana monitoring, automatic weekly Excel reports and alert system.

items.title: FastAPI Backend
items.description: High-performance REST API in Python with asynchronous request processing, Celery task queues and Redis caching.

items.title: This Website
items.description: Full-featured portfolio website with modern glassmorphism design, interactive 3D tilt effects, floating particles animation, i18n localization. Backend on FastAPI with Kafka queues, Redis caching, PostgreSQL, Telegram bot for notifications. Complete CI/CD coverage with GitHub Actions, E2E tests (Playwright), unit tests (Jest, pytest), linting and security scanning.
